description.en: Return the subcatchment id, basin id and/or regional unit id of the subcatchments into which the given points fall.

points_geojson.title: Coordinates (GeoJSON)
points_geojson.description: WGS84 Coordinates of the locations to be queried as a GeoJSON GeometryCollection or FeatureCollection. Please pass the values, not a URL.

points_geojson_url.title: Coordinates (GeoJSON)
points_geojson_url.description: WGS84 Coordinates of the locations to be queried as a GeoJSON GeometryCollection or FeatureCollection. Please pass a URL, not the values.

which_ids.title: Requested ids
which_ids.description: Whether we should return only regional unit id (reg_id), or also basin id (basin_id), or also subcatchment id (subc_id). Please provide the requested ids as a JSON list of strings, e.g. ['reg_id', 'basin_id', 'subc_id']

csv_url.title: Coordinates (String)
csv_url.description: WGS84 Coordinates of the locations to be queried as a CSV file (comma or semicolon both works). Please pass a URL, not the file contents.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Arbitrary string that will not be processed but returned, for user"s convenience.

local_ids.title: Regional Unit Ids, Basin Ids and Subcatchment Ids
local_ids.description: All ids, so it is visible which point falls into which subcatchment, basin and regional unit. Available as CSV file or as as a nested JSON structure. TODO: Maybe make that dictionary more understandable.
